definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
to depend on/to be dependent on
to depend on sth for existence/dependent on
to adhere/to attach oneself to/to append
mutually dependent for life (idiom); to rely upon one another for survival/interdependent
to be fondly attached to/to not wish to part with/to cling to

sentences.english: According to the regulations of Ministry of Education, hourly payment is based on the actual teaching hours.
sentences.chinese: 授课钟点费依教育部规定按实际授课时数核实支给。

sentences.english: In my choice, the medical profession is the most suitable.
sentences.chinese: 依我的看法，从医最合适。

sentences.english: Is it customary for guests at hotels in your country to tip the waiters?
sentences.chinese: 在贵国住旅馆的客人依惯例是否给侍者小费。

sentences.english: The house is built on mountains, and in accordance with the level terrain formed a patchwork pattern.
sentences.chinese: 小屋依山而建，并依地势高低形成了错落有致的格局。

sentences.english: And when Sarai afflicted her, she ran away.
sentences.chinese: 于是撒辣依就虐待她，她便由撒辣依面前逃跑了。

sentences.english: By my rambling digressions I perceive myself to be grown old.
sentences.chinese: 依我絮叨离题的程度来看，我知道我的确老了。

sentences.english: A: With my strong academic background, I am capable and competent.
sentences.chinese: 依我的良好学术背景，我是胜任愉快的。

sentences.english: Now being created in the image of God carries a further implication.
sentences.chinese: 那么依上帝形象创造便有了更多的涵意。

sentences.english: Now, I always sat with Sergei on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 现在我总是和塞尔盖依坐公共汽车。

sentences.english: The injection weight, injection rate and plasticizing capacity change according to the model and kind of the material.
sentences.chinese: 射出量，注射率及塑化能量依材料类别及模型而改变。

sentences.english: Full operational capacity for the system is contingent upon a combination of factors.
sentences.chinese: 出运体系的满负荷作业能力依不同因素综合而定。

sentences.english: The Princes Highway skirts the rim of the Illawa Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 公路绕着依拉瓦高原的边缘走。

sentences.english: OK, I have added three more references like you suggested.
sentences.chinese: 好了，我已经依你所建议的多加三个推荐人了。

sentences.english: Humans have a positive obligation towards the care and welfare of human-dependent animals.
sentences.chinese: 对于依人动物的照顾和福利，人类有积极的责任。

sentences.english: Everything is designed with your comfort in mind.
sentences.chinese: 每项设计都是依您的舒适需求而发想。

sentences.english: A single-syllable word can have several meanings depending on how it is intoned .
sentences.chinese: 一个单音节的字，依声调的不同，可以有几种意思。

definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
to be abbreviated to/(followed by a verb) slightly
